newsitem.title: JAPAN: NTT Data, Nissho Iwai to form outsourcing company.
newsitem.headline: NTT Data, Nissho Iwai to form outsourcing company.

text.p: NTT Data Corp, Nissho Iwai Corp and personnel firm Pasona said on Tuesday they plan to jointly form an outsourcing company.
They said in a statement that new firm will be the first comprehensive outsourcing company in Japan and that they will supply consultancy, payroll administration and information network services.
The joint venture will be formed on Wednesday with capitalisation of 400 million yen. It will aim for sales of one billion yen in the initial year, they said.
The new company will be owned 30 percent each by Nissho Iwai and NTT Data, a unit of Nippon Telegraph and Telephone Corp, with Pasona owning the rest, the statement said.
